blocks.name: fzoopth
blocks.content: A half-open integer range can represent an ordered pair, analogous to ~ fzopth . (Contributed by Alexander van der Vekens, 1-Jul-2018.)

blocks.name: 2ffzoeq
blocks.content: Two functions over a half-open range of nonnegative integers are equal if and only if their domains have the same length and the function values are the same at each position. (Contributed by Alexander van der Vekens, 1-Jul-2018.)
